name: stablish.me
tag_list: credible, skill, portfolios, competencies, personality, traits, authenticity, visualization
overview:
stablish.me is a social endorsement network -

create an authentic profile on the web with the help of your friends and network contacts. Badges show a user’s skills, competencies and personality traits. They aggregate to a visualised profile and show at a glance what makes you special.

Imagine a world where you never have to write a CV again. Your friends will do it for you by answering a simple question:

What are you really great at?
